mapper.select: select id, model_id as 'modelId', name, type, seq, remark, width, allow_blank as 'allowBlank', list_show as 'listShow', `sql`, status, mapping_data as 'mappingData' from `column` where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into `column` ( model_id, name, type, seq, remark, width, allow_blank, list_show, `sql`, status, mapping_data) values ( #{modelId}, #{name}, #{type}, #{seq}, #{remark}, #{width}, #{allowBlank}, #{listShow}, #{sql}, #{status}, #{mappingData})
mapper.update: update `column` set model_id = #{modelId}, name = #{name}, type = #{type}, seq = #{seq}, remark = #{remark}, width = #{width}, allow_blank = #{allowBlank}, list_show = #{listShow}, `sql` = #{sql}, status = #{status}, mapping_data = #{mappingData} where id = #{id}
